akn:section.akn:heading: Duty of Mayor to demolish or enclose deteriorated structure.

akn:content.akn:p: If a petition for review is not filed under ยง 42-3173.09 within the time period specified in ยง 42-3173.09, the Mayor shall demolish or enclose the deteriorated structure within 120 days after the notice of final determination has been mailed or filed, whichever is earlier.

If a petition for review is filed under ยง 42-3173.09 within the time period specified in ยง 42-3173.09, the Mayor shall demolish or enclose the deteriorated structure within 120 days after the court issues an order authorizing the Mayor to act, enters final judgment against the petitioner, or dismisses the petition.
